title: Far.Cry.4.[v1.4].Repack-R.G.Mechanics
description:
Far.Cry.4.[v1.4].Repack-R.G.Mechanics





Release info:  


Year of release : 2014
Genre : Action (Shooter) / 3D / 1st PERSON
DEVELOPER : Ubisoft MontrÃƒÂ©al
Publisher : Ubisoft Entertainment
PUBLICATION Type : RePack
Game Language:   Rus | Eng
Voice language:  Rus | Eng
Crack: RELOADED | 3DM | ALI213 | SKIDROW





System requirements:  

Operating system : WINDOWS 7, WINDOWS 8 , Windows 8.1 (x64 only)
Processor : Intel CORE i5-750 2.6 GHz or AMD Phenom II X4 955 3.2 GHz
RAM : 4 GB
Video Card : Nvidia GeForce GTX 460 or AMD RADEON HD5850
Sound Card : Sound device compatible with DirectX
Free space on hard disk : 35 GB


Game information:  


Welcome to Kirata - hidden in the Himalayas country with a rich tradition,
the world is threatened by a despotic ruler. Your HERO, Ajay Gail came here
to fulfill the last wish of his mother, but he was embroiled in a civil war:
the locals are trying to overthrow the pretender Pagan Mina. Embark on a
journey through the open world, but beware: in a foreign country
you anything can happen.


Game Features:  



Kirata fauna is DIVERSE: It is home to leopards, rhinos, eagles and even oviphages
rather rare badgers - honey badger. Hunter, remember: going after prey,
looking at the two, otherwise he will become a victim of ...
Mark enemy positions during the flight to improved giroplane, and if you notice,
try to escape with the help of costume-wing. Embark on a journey riding on a
huge elephant, the type of which even experienced soldier zatryasutsya hock!
Choose a suitable weapon! No matter how difficult the task may seem: due to
the large arsenal of weapons you can get out of any situation.



RePack Features:  


Far Cry 4
Version of the game - v1.4
Do not cut / recoded
Ability to select a combination of text and voice

[Fixed the "black screen" issue PC players were
experiencing when certain USB peripherals were plugged in.

Fixed the "grey screen" issue some PC players were may have
encountered after the Outpost Master Mission.]


Additions:  


Quest for a single game, available only with Season Pass
Delux-package "from Herc": 5 jobs and 5 types of weapons
Exclusive Weapon: Harpoon "Bow!"
The campaign "Jailbreak Durgesh"
The campaign "Valley of the Yeti"
"Invasion": PVP-mode and map
Operation "RETURN of Herc"
